name: Space Trouble (Haunted Forest)
description:
Your ship is damaged and your are drifting through space.
More and more trouble is piling up. But is it really safe to launch your emergency pod to the first available destination, or should you wait and hope for a better alternative?

A short game prototype created for ink jam 2020

NOTE: You have to extend the game twice to reach full screen mode. It is not working well if played in window mode.
